name: BluebotRobotics

”Alexa, ask blue bot to start cleaning”

skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: blue bot
des:
Want cleaner floors and carpets? Just speak up!
You can control Blaupunkt Robotics robot vacuum using only your voice. To get started, make sure you have an Blaupunkt Robotics account registered in the Blaupunkt Robotics app and your robot is connected and online.
Then, you just need to enable the Blaupunkt Robotics skill by clicking on the “Enable” button at the top of this screen. Once the skill is enabled, you will be asked to link with your Blaupunkt Robotics account 

When the connection is successfully built, you can simply control robot by saying :


You can control your robot by saying:
 “Alexa, ask blue bot to start cleaning.” 
“Alexa, ask blue bot to stop cleaning.”
“Alexa, ask blue bot to start charging.”
“Alexa,ask blue bot to start auto cleaning” 
“Alexa,ask blue bot to start edge cleaning” 
 “Alexa,ask blue bot to start spot cleaning” 
“Alexa,ask blue bot for his status ”
